name: mesos-maintenance-cli
description: A cli subcommand to maintenance mesos cluster of the DC/OS
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS subcommand is currently in alpha.
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS mesos-maintenance-cli subcommand is being installed!
